modName: Chevaleresse Armor for UNP by Yurica
summary: Adds a set of female armor and matching Greatsword called Faith Steel to the game
descriptionHtml:
Yurica's Chevaleresse Armor for UNP Base Body

[i]In hoc signo vinces[/i][b] - [/b][i][b]In this sign you will conquer[/b]

:+: Changes & Update :+:
v1.1 : fixed possible bug at max weight slider but no weight slider support yet :P thanks!

v2.0 : new hand-painted metal texture version & covered the revealed place... pls extract and place "meshes" and "textures" in your skyrim/data and replace all old files, then activate yurica_chevaleresse [HDT].esp or yurica_chevaleresse.esp [NON-HDT] (available in optional download) if you don't use HDT. thank you ^_^, enjoy!

7/8/2014 Updates: Added fixed blood mesh file for the Faithsteel Greatsword, please extract and let it replaces original sword mesh ^_^[/i]

:+: Description :+:

Hello again!

This mod adds a set of female Heavy Armor same level as Daedric Armor and a matching Greatsword called "Faith Steel" to the game.

The armor and the greatsword can be crafted in the forge under "Daedric Category" and tempered/improved in grinding stone or workbench; The armor is set as a matching set and Heavy Armor Perks is effective.

:+: Requirement :+:
- UNP Base Main Body
- HDT Highheel System (if you use HDT Version)

:+: Installation :+:
1 - Extract the files to a location.
2 - Place the extracted "Meshes" & "Textures" Folder into your skyrim/data.
3 - If you use HDT please put "yurica_chevaleresse [HDT].esp". (Requires HDT Highheel System).
3 - If you don't use HDT please put "yurica_chevaleresse [NON-HDT].esp". (Available in optional download).
4 - Activate only 1 of the esp.
5 - Enjoy & Please don't forget to endorse if you like the armor ^_^, thanks!

:+: Others :+:
There might be clipping in somewhere and in some special poses.
